hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
select EBLN.EBLN_ID, EBLN.EBLN_LINE_CODE, EBLN.EBLN_LINE_NAME, cdtl.cdtl_start_type, cdtl.cdtl_start_ebpl_code, cdtl.cdtl_end_type, cdtl.cdtl_end_ebpl_code, cdtl.cdtl_heavy_mileage, cdtl.CDTL_TRANS_TYPE
from eb_line EBLN left join cd_ts_line CDTL ON EBLN.EBLN_LINE_CODE = CDTL.CDTL_EBLN_CODE where 1=1 and cdtl.cdtl_start_ebpl_code is not null and cdtl.cdtl_end_ebpl_code is not null
<< and EBLN.ebln_status in (:eblnStatus)>> << and cdtl.cdtl_start_ebpl_code in (:cdtlStartEbplCodes)>> << and cdtl.cdtl_end_ebpl_code in (:cdtlEndEbplCodes)>> << and EBLN.EBLN_LINE_CODE = :eblnLineCode>> << and cdtl.cdtl_start_ebpl_code = :cdtlStartEbplCode >> << and cdtl.cdtl_end_ebpl_code = :cdtlEndEbplCode >>
